D

DataHandler - Class in datamanager
This Class is to Handle the data structures in the address book
DataHandler() - Constructor for class datamanager.DataHandler
This constructor initializes the HashMap to handle data
datamanager - package datamanager
A package to Handle the data for the address book
DBHandler - Class in dbmanager
DBHandler is used to create connection to databases and perform other operations on the database.
DBHandler() - Constructor for class dbmanager.DBHandler
 
dbmanager - package dbmanager
dbmanager is a package that has a collection of classes than handle databases
deleteElement(Connection, String, int) - Method in class dbmanager.DBHandler
This function deletes the record based on the ID
DeleteRecordFrame - Class in guis
This is the Frame to delete a record from the database
DeleteRecordFrame(Connection, String) - Constructor for class guis.DeleteRecordFrame
This constructor creates and initializes the elements of the Frame.
